reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Read the reviews of the hotel on Trip advisor and decided to give a try. Stayed in the hotel with my wife for around 4 days.The view from the room was the best we have ever had in our life. Beautiful alps with snow, soothing sunshine and steady river, it was just perfect. The memerizing view will from the hotel room balcony will remain for ever with us. Really looking forward to stay in the hotel again. As for the hotel staff and facilities it was good. Highly recommended for those who want to stay away from hustle & bustle of city life to relax in the laps of nature.
reviews.title: Excellent View of Switzerland

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Very cute hotel right on the river. Great views of the Alps and the river from our balcony. Loved watching the sun rise on the Alps (beautiful pictures). Definitely worth the extra money to get the river/Alps view. Very friendly and helpful staff. Good continental breakfast and afternoon tea/cake included in the room rate. Rooms are very clean and bright with modern bathrooms. Good color scheme in our room (yellow and white with blond wood). About a 10 minute walk to either train station (but a pretty walk along the river). The hotel is not right downtown (about a 5 or 10 minute walk to the middle of town) but the plus to this is that the hotel is quiet - no road noise. We would definitely stay here again.
reviews.title: Loved our stay here

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed in Goldey for 2 nights and the stay was very pleasant. the location is a little obscure and is hard to find from the train station (it is closer to Interlaken west). the information counter at the train station wasnt able to help us with directions and told us to take a taxi - but we asked the bus drivers and one fantastic bus driver took pains to ask other drivers and took us in his bus and dropped us at the closest road and we had to walk only 5 minutes from there. i would say if you get the room with the balcony overlooking the river (which we were lucky enough to get) - then the overal view from your window is even better than what you would get from the grand victoria (there you have jungfrau in the background but you have paragliders landing for an immediate view). Here you have a fantastic riverside setting for immediate view and jungrau in the background. breakfast was OK - we got charged for seprate eggs which in my opinion was a little steep as in other resorts that we stayed in - we didnt have to pay extra.
reviews.title: perfect location - not too far from the center and yet away from the hustle & bustle

reviews.title: Best hotel & services

reviews.text: We were looking for a hotel in Interlaken with easy parking and Hotel Goldey was great. It was easy to find right on the edge of the water. There is a parking lot with free parking right in front. The hotel is outdated looking with strange decor, but the rooms were nice and very clean. We had a room facing the parking lot, so it was very quiet, but a view facing the water would have been ideal. The hotel is located on the less busy side of the water, so you can easily walk across the bridge into the main area of town. We loved walking along the water and the views were amazing. The hotel has breakfast included, as well as tea every afternoon with small desserts. There is also free wi-fi.
